CustomField.formula:
/*IF( Allocation_Table__r.Cruise_Solo_Check__c , Allocation_Table__r.ON_Held__c + Allocation_Table__r.ON_Sold__c + Allocation_Table__r.ON_Solo_Cruise__c , Allocation_Table__r.ON_Held__c + Allocation_Table__r.ON_Sold__c) */
IF( Allocation_Table__r.Min_Number_Manager__c=null , Allocation_Table__r.Total_Allocation_In_Progress_ON__c+ Allocation_Table__r.Total_Allocation_Secured_ON__c ,Allocation_Table__r.Min_Number_Manager__r.Allocation_In_Progress__c + Allocation_Table__r.Min_Number_Manager__r.Allocation_Secured__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field refers to TAD orders (POE) - is a total of ON Held + ON Sold + counts Solo if "Solo Check" is true
CustomField.label: Total Sold + Hold (POE)
